remarks: The difference of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsuminv as of 6-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumsubOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumsubOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumsubOLD.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
gsumsubOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
gsumsubOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumsubOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumsubOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) $.
gsumsubOLD.fn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumsubOLD.hn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumsubOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .- H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .- ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
